contentList.content: The Ghost of Faerun is a nomadic warrior much like a Samurai. But they also seem to have an innate command and authority over lesser creatures. Using their unique Brand mechanic they can fully dominate and control one target for a time.
This spell summons a level appropriate Katana and Long Bow
Fires a poisonous arrow that damages the target and creates a bubbling surface to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="POISONED">Poison</LSTag> creatures.
Fires a cold arrow that damages the target and possibly freezes them solid for 2 turns.
Fires an arrow that explodes on impact.
Imbue your weapon with fiery might. It receives a +1 bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>, and deals an additional [1].
A ranged resource that is recharged by entering stealth or at the end of combat.
A resource used for certain abilities that is recharged when using reactions or at the end of combat.
A ranged strike that teleports you to your target and does a melee attack.
Parry unarmed and weapon attacks to reduce their damage by [1].
On a hit, receive half damage from a foe's attack.
If the character reaches 0 <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag>, it regains [1] instead of falling Unconscious.
Immune to being <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blinded</LSTag> by your smoke bomb for 2 turns.
A graceful melee attack that does extra damage against dazed enemies.
Ranged attack that targets up to 5 enemies, does 1d4 damage to each, and has a chance to daze and reduce movement speed for 2 turns.
Force an enemy to fight alongside you. Every time the enemy takes damage, it makes a Wisdom <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> against your domination.
This enemy is dominated and fights for you.

Attack enemies in a cone which summons a strong wind that clears cloud surfaces and damages up to 6 creatures for 1/2 melee damage and forces them <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="OFF_BALANCED">Off Balance</LSTag>.
The number you need to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">roll</LSTag> a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> while attacking is reduced by 1. Additionally you receive one more Reaction Point.

The number you need to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">roll</LSTag> a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> while attacking is reduced by 2. Additionally you receive one more Reaction Point, bringing your total to three.

Reduce the damage from a ranged weapon attack by 1d10 + your Dexterity Modifier + your level.

If the damage is reduced to 0, you use a Resolve Point to Deflect the Missile.
Drops a smoke bomb at your feet which turns you invisible for 3 turns and makes a small fog cloud to obscure enemy sight.
On a hit, receive half damage from a foe's attack.
